attributes.action: If pitballs are thoroughly assessed and show no sign of aggression should not be put down despite their size.
attributes.additional_details:
After watching the dangerous dogs act I am appalled by the fact that they would put down a dog due to its size even though it shows no sign of aggression and some are just normal animal dogs however have to be out down simply due to 'size'. I think if a dog
Is thoroughly assessed and shows no sign of aggression the pitbull should not be put down based to 'size'.
